title: Claude Code SessionStart Hook Output Schema
description: Expected JSON schema for Claude Code SessionStart hook output. See: https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code/hooks

hookEventName.description: Must be 'SessionStart' to match the hook event type

additionalContext.description: Context to inject into the session. Will be shown to Claude.

notes: The hookSpecificOutput.additionalContext field is the only way to inject context
Previous incorrect schema used {type: ..., content: ...} which was not recognized
